body_html:
Alright. What I intend to do would be to first implement some form of smart padding, so not much information is lost. If we look at python PIL, when we rotate the image, some parts are left black. We just have to pad the image by a scale of sqrt(2), do a rotation, find the center and extract the same sized square.

This is how I intend to do it, suggestions and improvements are welcome!

EDIT: Or should I just implement a no-frills rotate first? Parts will be blacked out.
